name: Ivory Tiles
description:
***FREE FULL GAME! DOWNLOAD NOW!!***

***Where Zen and Relaxation Meet Puzzle Gaming***

Download Ivory Tiles today while it's FREE!!!

Over 80 hand-crafted levels of Puzzle Zen. The original puzzler that is easy to pick up and play, yet challenging to master.

Tilt or touch your iPhone or iPod Touch to stack, slide, turn, trap, ferry, drop and shift the tiles to their home.

Regarded by many as a meditative pastime, this original creation includes over 80 uniquely hand-crafted gameboards.

Simple to understand and play, but a lifetime to master. Follow the ancient Taoists as you journey with increasing difficulty from the Beach to the Heavens. Can you reach enlightenment?

Features:
- Over 80 hand crafted levels to pit your brain against.
- Progressive difficulty means kids can have fun playing the early stages.
- Supports both tilt and touch input control.
- Beautiful mahogany boards and ivory tiles rendered in realtime 3D.
- Soothing authentic traditional Chinese music arranged by "Silk & Bamboo Ensemble" and "Cheng Yu"
- Personal high scores tracked for each puzzle. Achieve Zen when you take it a step further and reach the "perfect" score.
- Campaign screen and easy-to-use level select.
- Configurable audio and input settings.

---
